title: Moon Love
overview: Yun Chaoyan, a girl who is "haunted by the renegade immortal", happens to meet Ren Shique, the lunar god who "recaptures the renegade immortal". In order to get rid of the renegade immortal, Yun Chaoyan tries every possible means to get entangled with Ren Shique, and the two begin a fantastical lifelong journey together. Also, their bond doesn't stop there...
